name: Going Home
description:
A GAME ABOUT A LIFE WORTH KNOWING...  Going Home is a pixel art game that emphasizes on the deep theme and story with horror and suspense elements.  Features:
  • PIXELATED ART STYLE TO EMPHASIZE THE THEME AND TONE OF THE GAME
  • STORY DRIVEN GAME
  • CLASSIC NARRATIVE WITH PUZZLES
  • MULTIPLE ENDINGS BASED ON USER'S ACTIONS DURING THE GAME
  • HORROR ELEMENT- JUMPSCARES!
  •  BEAUTIFUL SOUNDTRACKS
  • AD-FREE, NO IN-GAME PURCHASES, Donate what you want

A Game By: Brandon

Support by donation via PAYPAL

FOR THE GUIDE ON FINISHING THE GAME - Definite Guide and Walkthrough!
